definition: to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: Nine bead application of my vexatious rights to provoke nan peja trouble.
sentences.chinese: 九珠应用本人的无理取闹权益惹楠佩费事。

sentences.english: Cunning and vicious people often come to the shop to provoke unwarranted trouble.
sentences.chinese: 经常有刁恶的人来店里无理取闹。

sentences.english: Don't get fresh,or I'll tell your boss.
sentences.chinese: 不要无理取闹，否则我告诉你的老板。

sentences.english: Cats are less of a bother than dogs when they misbehave.
sentences.chinese: 当它们无理取闹时，狗比猫更麻烦。

sentences.english: Vexatious, this is I make your privilege.

sentences.english: On the facts clearly vexatious been taken strictly according to law ruling.
sentences.chinese: 对事实清楚无理取闹的被拆迁人严格依法裁决。

sentences.english: He was offended by her unreasonable quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 他被她的无理取闹激怒了。

sentences.english: To create troubles in public places should BE condemned by social opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在公共场所里无理取闹应该受到社会舆论的谴责。

sentences.english: Finally, you should pay attention to the vexatious topic of charges.
sentences.chinese: 最后，你要注意把握无理取闹的话题收费。

sentences.english: I have tears in your heart is always vexatious.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼泪在你心里永远是无理取闹。

sentences.english: And every time you make trouble out of nothing I have tolerance, compromise.
sentences.chinese: 而每次你的无理取闹我都容忍了，妥协了。

sentences.english: Victor: If she is being unreasonable, just ignore her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她是无理取闹，就不要理她。

sentences.english: To this, husband often censures my willfully make a trouble.
sentences.chinese: 对此，老公常常指责我无理取闹。

sentences.english: I won't mention before your good, not vexatious also won't bother.
sentences.chinese: 我不会提及从前你的好，不会无理取闹也不会再打扰。

sentences.english: I face the vexatious, you no longer just smile.
sentences.chinese: 面对我的无理取闹，你不再只是笑笑。

sentences.english: And of course, the teens see it in exactly the same way, except oppositely.
sentences.chinese: 而且当然，小孩也的也是这么想，是父母的无理取闹。
